name: Prakash Ravichandran
description:
I am a embedded engineer at the Research and Development (R&D) at Unibose Technology, Chennai , actively involved in cutting-edge research projects in Robotics & Industrial Automation, DSP, Power Electronics, Instrumentation & Control System. My focus includes IoT, AI, Machine Learning on Microcontrollers, and Firmware, with a deep passion for developing innovative solutions that benefit sectors like robotics and automation, healthcare, and education. 
In addition to my research responsibilities, I am actively involved in making resources , developing project modules, and exploring various tech. My enthusiasm for learning new electrical & electronics topics and research embedded drives me to make significant contributions and positively impact experiences. I am constantly striving to expand my knowledge and expertise in the field, with the ultimate goal of making a meaningful impact through my work.
note: Seeking new opportunities in Embedded Systems.
